column4: i wanted to donwload this online game but it reads as"unexecutable bit" the url is:http://flyff.gpotato.com/?m=game&a=download ( if that helps)
on second thoughts, it looks like a windows executable. You *might* be able to run it under wine, but not otherwise...
http://cdn.pandonetworks.com/pando/FlyffDownloader.exe is a windows executable. You either run it in windows, or under wine, Nothing else will work...
